component_definitions.capacity_stress: Inverse-normalized effective capacity pressure. Higher means tighter capacity or missing anchors.
component_definitions.leadtime_stress: Normalized lead-time pressure in weeks. Higher means longer lead times or missing anchors.
component_definitions.substitution_difficulty: Difficulty of replacing supply path, derived from promotion gate status, priority, and blocker language.
component_definitions.compliance_drag: Burden from tariff uplift, regulatory delay, and export-control risk.
component_definitions.confidence_penalty: Penalty from low confidence across capacity/econ/trade stacks and proxy-heavy evidence.

confidence_adjustment: confidence_adjusted_bti = bti_score * (1 - confidence_penalty/200), clamped by factor in [0.35,1.0]

uncertainty_band_definition.uncertainty_score_inputs: confidence_penalty + missing-anchor penalties + rollup completeness penalties
